name: Ten Things to Do on a Rainy Day Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text: Eric loudly proclaimed his love for pink cotton candy.
Anna decided that both under and over would be correct answers to the question.
If you win do you intend to share?
Most or many people playing this quiz love to play games.
Susan's now going to look for her ski boots.
We couldn't find Ishmael's trombone or its case.
Even in a dress, Lee tried to act macho.
The raccoon had torn a doughnut-shaped hole in the trash-bag.
Ramon soon realized that his trip to China was going to be delayed.
While imprisoned in the gulag a leader from the other group was sent in.
